mapper.select:
select psd.product_sell_daily_id, psd.create_time, psd.total, s.shop_id, s.shop_name, p.product_id, p.product_name from tb_product_sell_daily psd, tb_shop s, tb_product p
psd.shop_id = s.shop_id and psd.product_id = p.product_id
and psd.shop_id = #{productSellDailyCondition.shop.shopId}
and p.product_name like '%${productSellDailyCondition.product.productName}%'
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') between date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d') and date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(psd.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by psd.product_id,psd.create_time
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product_sell_daily(product_id,shop_id,create_time,total)( select product_id,shop_id,date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d'),count(product_id) as total from tb_user_product_map where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)group by product_id)

insert into tb_product_sell_daily(product_id,shop_id,create_time,total) ( select p.product_id,p.shop_id,date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day),0 as total from tb_product p
where p.product_id not in(select product_id from tb_product_sell_daily where date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_sub(curdate(),interval 1 day)))
